If you have a special someone or event on the Gold Coast, are interstate, overseas or lack the time to drive around, want something that is special and unique, are driven by value not price, appreciate details, like to plan ahead a little and can trust us to convey your wishes, then you're our customer.

We want you to feel good about your investment so we ask a few questions to make sure we understand your needs!

About Us.

Maud and Ivy, what does it mean and who are we?

Maud is a nickname I have had since childhood and Ivy is my daughter’s name and also a beautiful plant I like to work with. The name just seemed like a beautiful choice to me.

When you look deeper into the meanings of these names, they become more apt. Maud is an old...
